<S%G2531>As<s%> I <S%G3870>urged<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> when I was <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G4357>stay<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you might <S%G3853>command<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> men <S%G3361>not<s%> to <S%G2085>teach<s%> a different <S%G2085>doctrine,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5056>goal<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> this <S%G3852>command<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>love,<s%> out of a <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G505>sincere<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
from <S%G3739>which<s%> things <S%G5100>some,<s%> having missed the <S%G795>mark,<s%> have turned <S%G1624>aside<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> vain <S%G3150>talking;<s%>

<S%G2309>desiring<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> teachers of the <S%G3547>law,<s%> though they <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> they <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> about <S%G3739>what<s%> they strongly <S%G1226>affirm.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5530>uses<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G3545>lawfully,<s%>

for the sexually <S%G4205>immoral,<s%> for <S%G733>homosexuals,<s%> for <S%G405>slave-traders,<s%> for <S%G5583>liars,<s%> for <S%G1965>perjurers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G480>for<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G480>other<s%> <S%G2087>thing<s%> contrary <S%G480>to<s%> the <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%>

according <S%G2596>to<s%> the Good <S%G2098>News<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was committed <S%G4100>to<s%> <S%G1473>my<s%> <S%G4100>trust.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2192>I<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> him who <S%G1743>enabled<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2233>counted<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4103>faithful,<s%> appointing <S%G5087>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1248>service;<s%>

although I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4386>before<s%> a <S%G989>blasphemer,<s%> <S%G2532>a<s%> <S%G1376>persecutor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5197>insolent.<s%> <S%G235>However,<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4160>did<s%> it <S%G50>ignorantly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G570>unbelief.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5250>abounded<s%> exceedingly <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G594>acceptance,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G268>sinners;<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4413>chief.<s%>

<S%G235>However,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> this <S%G5124>cause<s%> I obtained <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> might <S%G1731>display<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4314>patience,<s%> for an <S%G5296>example<s%> of those who were <S%G3195>going<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to the <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G165>eternal,<s%> <S%G862>immortal,<s%> <S%G517>invisible,<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G3441>alone<s%> is <S%G4680>wise,<s%> be <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G3852>instruction<s%> I <S%G3908>commit<s%> <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> my <S%G5043>child<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4394>prophecies<s%> which <S%G4254>led<s%> the <S%G1909>way<s%> to <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> you may <S%G4754>wage<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4754>warfare;<s%>
